languages.text: К тому моменту как ремонт будет завершен, экипаж ассимилируется в колонию и умрет, а про грузы, поступившие на "временное хранение", все забудут. Юридически к Вольному Торговцу не придраться, но местное население, надеевшееся поживиться грузами и запчастями, раздосадовано.

By the time the repairs are complete, the crew will have assimilated into the colony and long since died, and the fact that the cargo was given to the dynasty for "temporary safekeeping" will have faded from memory. The Rogue Trader's actions are irreproachable, but the colony dwellers, who had hoped to help themselves to a precious haul and some ship components, are left disappointed.
languages.original_text: К тому моменту как ремонт будет завершен, экипаж ассимилируется в колонию и умрет, а про грузы, поступившие на "временное хранение", все забудут. Юридически к Вольному Торговцу не придраться, но местное население, надеевшееся поживиться грузами и запчастями, раздосадовано.

traits.locale_text: By the time the repairs will be complete, the crew will have been assimilated into the colony and long since died, and the fact that the cargo was given to the dynasty for "temporary safekeeping" will have faded from memory. The Rogue Trader's actions are irreproachable, but the colony dwellers, who had hoped to help themselves to a precious haul and some ship components, are left disappointed.
Miraculously, the survivors of the crash died of exhaustion, never getting out of the wreckage.

By the time the repairs are complete, the crew will have assimilated into the colony and long since died, and the fact that the cargo was given to the dynasty for "temporary safekeeping" will have faded from memory. The Rogue Trader's actions are irreproachable, but the colony dwellers, who had hoped to help themselves to a precious haul and some ship components, are left disappointed.

The Rogue Trader's actions are irreproachable, but the colony dwellers, who had hoped to help themselves to a precious haul and some ship components, are left disappointed.

The Rogue Trader's actions are irreproachable, but the colony dwellers, who had hoped to help themselves to a precious haul and some ship components, are left disappointed.

The Rogue Trader's actions are irreproachable, but the colony dwellers, who had hoped to help themselves to a precious haul and some ship components, are left disappointed.

By the time the repairs are complete, the crew will have assimilated into the colony and long since died, and the fact that the cargo was given to the dynasty for "temporary safekeeping" will have faded from memory. The Rogue Trader's actions are irreproachable, but the colony dwellers, who had hoped to help themselves to a precious haul and some ship components, are left disappointed.

languages.text: Une fois les réparations terminées, l'équipage se sera intégré à la population locale avant de mourir de vieillesse, et tout le monde aura oublié que la cargaison n'a été confiée à la dynastie que temporairement. Si les actions {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sont irréprochables, les habitants de la colonie sont déçus, eux qui espéraient faire main basse sur une précieuse cargaison et des composants de vaisseau.
languages.original_text: By the time the repairs are complete, the crew will have assimilated into the colony and long since died, and the fact that the cargo was given to the dynasty for "temporary safekeeping" will have faded from memory. The Rogue Trader's actions are irreproachable, but the colony dwellers, who had hoped to help themselves to a precious haul and some ship components, are left disappointed.

traits.locale_text: Une fois les réparations terminées, l'équipage se sera intégré à la population locale avant de mourir de vieillesse, et tout le monde aura oublié que la cargaison n'a été confiée à la dynastie que temporairement. Si les actions {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sont irréprochables, les habitants de la colonie sont déçus, eux qui espéraient faire main basse sur une précieuse cargaison et des composants de vaisseau.

languages.text: 修理が完了するころには、クルーはコロニーに移住し、死後久しくなっており、積み荷が「一時預かり」として王朝に預けられた事実も記憶から消えていることだろう。自由開拓者の行動は非難されるものではないが、貴重な積み荷と船の部品を手に入れることを期待していたコロニーの住民たちは失望する羽目になった。
languages.original_text: By the time the repairs are complete, the crew will have assimilated into the colony and long since died, and the fact that the cargo was given to the dynasty for "temporary safekeeping" will have faded from memory. The Rogue Trader's actions are irreproachable, but the colony dwellers, who had hoped to help themselves to a precious haul and some ship components, are left disappointed.

traits.locale_text: 修理が完了するころには、クルーはコロニーに移住し、死後久しくなっており、積み荷が「一時預かり」として王朝に預けられた事実も記憶から消えていることだろう。自由開拓者の行動は非難されるものではないが、貴重な積み荷と船の部品を手に入れることを期待していたコロニーの住民たちは失望する羽目になった。

languages.text: 等到修复工作结束之后，原本的船员恐怕早就老死了，新一代的船员恐怕也早已和殖民地的人打成了一片，所有人都会忘记行商浪人“代为保管”货物的事情。行商浪人这个决定本身无可指摘，但殖民地的居民却感到有些失望，他们本以为能趁这个机会捞走一部分珍贵的货物、零件之类的。
languages.original_text: By the time the repairs are complete, the crew will have assimilated into the colony and long since died, and the fact that the cargo was given to the dynasty for "temporary safekeeping" will have faded from memory. The Rogue Trader's actions are irreproachable, but the colony dwellers, who had hoped to help themselves to a precious haul and some ship components, are left disappointed.

traits.locale_text: 等到修复工作结束之后，原本的船员恐怕早就老死了，新一代的船员恐怕也早已和殖民地的人打成了一片，所有人都会忘记行商浪人“代为保管”货物的事情。行商浪人这个决定本身无可指摘，但殖民地的居民却感到有些失望，他们本以为能趁这个机会捞走一部分珍贵的货物、零件之类的。

languages.text: Para cuando las reparaciones estén completas, la tripulación se habrá unido a la colonia y apenas será un recuerdo, y el hecho de que el cargamento se entregara a la dinastía para «protegerla temporalmente» habrá caído en el olvido. Los actos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente son irreprochables, pero los habitantes de la colonia, que esperaban hacerse con un buen botín y unos componentes de nave, están decepcionados.
languages.original_text: By the time the repairs are complete, the crew will have assimilated into the colony and long since died, and the fact that the cargo was given to the dynasty for "temporary safekeeping" will have faded from memory. The Rogue Trader's actions are irreproachable, but the colony dwellers, who had hoped to help themselves to a precious haul and some ship components, are left disappointed.

traits.locale_text: Para cuando las reparaciones estén completas, la tripulación se habrá unido a la colonia y apenas será un recuerdo, y el hecho de que el cargamento se entregara a la dinastía para «protegerla temporalmente» habrá caído en el olvido. Los actos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente son irreprochables, pero los habitantes de la colonia, que esperaban hacerse con un buen botín y unos componentes de nave, están decepcionados.

languages.text: Wenn die Reparaturen eines Tages abgeschlossen sind, wird die Crew lange vorher von der Kolonie assimiliert worden und längst gestorben sein. Niemand wird sich mehr daran erinnern, dass die Fracht der Dynastie ursprünglich nur zur "vorübergehenden Aufbewahrung" überlassen worden war. Das Verhalten {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ist absolut untadelig, doch die Bewohner der Kolonie hatten gehofft, sich wertvolle Fracht und ein paar Schiffskomponenten nehmen zu können. Sie sind enttäuscht.
languages.original_text: By the time the repairs are complete, the crew will have assimilated into the colony and long since died, and the fact that the cargo was given to the dynasty for "temporary safekeeping" will have faded from memory. The Rogue Trader's actions are irreproachable, but the colony dwellers, who had hoped to help themselves to a precious haul and some ship components, are left disappointed.

traits.locale_text: Wenn die Reparaturen eines Tages abgeschlossen sind, wird die Crew lange vorher von der Kolonie assimiliert worden und längst gestorben sein. Niemand wird sich mehr daran erinnern, dass die Fracht der Dynastie ursprünglich nur zur "vorübergehenden Aufbewahrung" überlassen worden war. Das Verhalten {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ist absolut untadelig, doch die Bewohner der Kolonie hatten gehofft, sich wertvolle Fracht und ein paar Schiffskomponenten nehmen zu können. Sie sind enttäuscht.

languages.text: Mürettebat, onarımların tamamlanana kadar koloninin bünyesine katılarak çoktan nihayetine ermiş olacak. Kargonun hanedanlığa "geçici koruma" amacıyla verildiği gerçeği ise hafızalardan silinecek. Hür Tacir'in eylemlerinin aleyhine söz edilemese de koloni sakinleri, kendilerine kıymetli ganimetler ve birkaç gemi bileşeni ayırabileceklerini umarken hayal kırıklığına uğradıklarıyla kaldı.
languages.original_text: By the time the repairs are complete, the crew will have assimilated into the colony and long since died, and the fact that the cargo was given to the dynasty for "temporary safekeeping" will have faded from memory. The Rogue Trader's actions are irreproachable, but the colony dwellers, who had hoped to help themselves to a precious haul and some ship components, are left disappointed.
